properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_BIRTH, ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_ADDR, SECESSION_FL, IS_ADMIN FROM MEMBER
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT r.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, r.RESTAURANT_NAME, r.RESTAURANT_IMG, r.RESTAURANT_ADDR, r.REPORT_CONTENT, r.REPORT_DATE, r.REPORT_CATEGORY FROM report r JOIN member m ON m.MEMBER_NO = r.MEMBER_NO WHERE m.MEMBER_EMAIL = ?
SELECT r.MEMBER_NO,m.MEMBER_EMAIL,r.REPORT_CATEGORY,r.RESTAURANT_NAME,r.RESTAURANT_ADDR,r.RESTAURANT_IMG,r.REPORT_CONTENT,r.REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT r JOIN member m ON m.MEMBER_NO = r.MEMBER_NO
